```{r setup}
library(platowork)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
```

# Introduction
The package `platowork` provides a small data set with the results of an informal test I did with my son of the tDCS (Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation) headset using speed typing from [10fastfingers.com](https://10fastfingers.com/). 

# Plot

```{r plot}
data_summary <- plato %>% 
  group_by(subject, session) %>% 
  summarise(wpm = mean(wpm),
            date = mean(date),
            .groups = "drop")

plato %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = wpm, color = subject)) +
  geom_point()

```
